name: sculpted
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
sculpt
[ I or T ] to create solid objects that represent a thing, person, idea, etc. out of a material such as wood, clay, metal, or stone: Johnny sculpted an old man's head out of wood.
[ T ] to form into a particular shape: The dripping water had sculpted strange shapes out of the rocks/sculpted the rocks into strange shapes.
